thread.section_title: The/Studio Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The/Studio | thestudio.com
thread.title: Connor TuCash McCann
thread.title_full: The/Studio reviewed by Connor TuCash McCann

author: Connor TuCash McCann
title: Connor TuCash McCann
text: To The/Studio: I wanted to let you know that I couldn't be happier with how the Animal House patches turned out! Our clothing line is days away from its launch. Our logo arrived beautifully stitched together and exactly how we imagined it! Thanks to your company, I was able to turn my dream into a reality within a few conversations between myself and your team. Thank you guys, it was a pleasure working with you!
